data.author: David Emanuel Oprea

changelog.release_notes:
Simple watchface that displays a text instead of time. You may customize it to have your own text, or even motivational small phrases. However, if you want to see the time, just shake your hand. 

Update 1.1: Added Settings screen to setup your own text. 
Update 1.2: Fix display time format. 
Update 1.3: Fix settings properties. 
Update 1.4: Fix handshake bug.
Update 1.5: Settings screen: change the timeout and display format.
